subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Golden State became the first No. 8 seed to beat a No. 1 seed in an N.B.A. seven-game series, dismissing Dallas in Game 6 on Thursday night.
snippet: Golden State became the first No. 8 seed to beat a No. 1 seed in an N.B.A. seven-game series, dismissing Dallas in Game 6 on Thursday night.
